ModMetaData.name: I Like Build Base
ModMetaData.author: Vex, eth0net
ModMetaData.description:
Do you Like Build Base? Well, this is for you!
Now updated to 1.5! This is a fork of the original by Vex for 1.4.
== Features ==
New storyteller with no raids, only small incidents, and base building!
== Existing Saves ==
This mod is safe for saves as it only impacts the game setup steps.
== Bugs and Requests ==
Let me know if there are any bugs or requests, I'll happily do my best to fix them up!
